attributes.action: Call a General Election to make MPs have to go back & face their constituence.
attributes.additional_details: MPs have made a pigears of the whole Brexit proceedure, the people voted to leave , the MPs voted for the referendum to take place and vowed to respect the result , they are not honouring their promise and they are not honouring the result , they are underminding the democracy of this great country ..its tike the MPs were made to face their voters and explain their actions of the last 2 years and to explain their future actions so the people can decide if they still want then to represent them.
attributes.background: Its time that the MPs were made to go to face their constituents , many got voted in on manifesto's to uphold the result of the 2016 EU REFERENDUM , since then , many have just gone and done what every they want , its time for a reality check for all MPs to realise who votes for them and why.
